name: Wow Quest
description:
There is a final boss at the end that is kinda like a hidden gem for those who make it that far! (WOW WHAT COULD THAT FINAL BOSS BE??)

This was my first game jam and I decided to take this on solo, so any feedback would be appreciated! Any issues before the end of the game jam may be fixed but my time is very limited during the remainder of the jam!

I have been learning/practicing game development for about a year, and this is the 4th attempt of a game I have ever created but doing this in a week was a bit of a challenge for me that I feel like I was able to overcome!

Feel free to leave a tip if you happened to enjoy it!

Wallet #: DHjDUpNnG4pLSDTDYYL7tBKx6CKhJLaVMj

I've been asked where the soundtrack comes from, well it came from my hit single, Doge to the Moon
